Level forteen
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level forteen
By Y.K.TAN on Wednesday, July 18, 2001 - 04:17 am:

Stage 14


When you start,dash all the way to the end,and get the golden key,and move right two steps,and wait for the joker's to be on the right hand part of the stage,than destroy the box,and jump down and move left,and destroy the box below you,and wait for the joker's now below you,to move right first,than head on down. Than move two steps right,and destroy the box right/underneath of you,and hide there for the meantime,until the joker's all past to your left,and dash to nearly the end of the right-hand side,and detsroy the box there,wait for the all'
s clear when the joker now below you have reach right,and as quick as lightning,run left,and jump down,and dash and win stage 14,AND NOW YOU WIN STAGE 14.
